reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress looks exactly like the photos and is perfect for petite women, with high-quality velvet material that feels comfortable and flattering. The gorgeous red and deep true teal colors receive positive feedback, and one customer notes it falls right at the ankles. The fabric weight receives mixed opinions, with some loving the weight while others find it heavy. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, comfy and bump friendly!
items.body: Beautiful dress - just as high quality as more expensive versions on other websites, as well as comfortable, flattering and stretchy. Bonus for being both bump friendly and modest in the chest (will be wearing for Christmas services at church and was afraid of cleavage showing for my 36DD girls, but this covers them completely without looking dumpy.) And the length is great if you're short - it will fit like tea length if you're taller, but on me (5'1"), it falls right at my ankles, so no alterations needed. Read more
items.author: Heather J

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: This turned out so cute. Wore it for family pictures. Great quality and super soft. It looks just like the picture. It did run a little big. Iâ€™m usually a medium and I returned it and got a small and it fit perfect and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Rachel russell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and great quality!
items.body: I bought the gold crushed velvet. The coloring is very beautiful and the velvet is of high quality rich looking material and very, very comfy and cozy!!!! it has a lot of stretch at the waist. The elastic at the waist doesnâ€™t dig and is very comfortable. It is medium weight so it is good for the cooler months. At 5â€™ 4â€™ it comes down to my ankles. Read more
items.author: Clothes Lover

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice & Comfortable
items.body: Really nice and comfortable, dressy yet cool and up to date. Flows nice and feels soft. Read more
items.author: mel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vibrant color, flattering style
items.body: Beautiful color, comfortable and flattering. Got this for family photos after having a baby and I absolutely was so impressed with quality and fit. Read more
items.author: Chelsea C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Gorgeous!!! Must Have
items.body: Absolutely Gorgeous! Iâ€™ve been searching everywhere for the perfect dress for our Thanksgiving Family Portraitâ€¦. Ladies this dress is perfect, the material is absolutely gorgeous with its unique texture, looks even more beautiful than the online description. The color I chose is rich and bold. I HIGHLY recommend this dress, Iâ€™m buying it in every color!! Read more
items.author: eL

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Static nightmare!
items.body: Beautiful dress! It fit well with the elastic waist. The velvet fabric was full of static, even after washing and drying with a fabric softener. The long length picked up every hair in my house and though my spouse used half a lint roller before leaving the house it continued to pick up lint and hair. The color was a little off as well. It was more of a dark teal than evergreen. Still pretty though. Read more
items.author: Rebecca

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wore to Wedding
items.body: Wore this to a wedding where I knew I would have to run around and take care of my two small kids. Looked great and was great quality. Super comfortable and got a lot of compliments. Fit true to size. Read more
items.author: Gina Fries

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi V Neck Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi V Neck Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi V Neck Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Winered, Brown, Gold, Hazeblue, Sage Green, Black, Champagne, Crushed-burntorange, Armygreen, Crushed-gold, Darkgreen, Crushed-black, Pink, Darkblue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
